node.title: badly commented writeups
node.doctext:
This is a list of writeups which have an opening to an HTML comment (<--) without a closing (-->). As such, they may have some content hidden. Up until about 6 months ago, this wouldn't have hidden content most times because our HTML tag balancing code worked differently. -[oldminer[user]|om], 2010 April 03
